department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Laboratory in Engineering and Physical Biology
course.description: A project-oriented laboratory course which will integrate genetic, molecular, biochemical and cytological approaches from the life sciences with optical, magnetic and mechanical approaches from the physical sciences. Interesting and original experiments will be organized around a common theme which, this year, will be "Biomechanics of E. coli."
course.notes: Intended primarily for first year graduate students in the EPB PhD track but available to other graduate students and advanced undergraduates as space and resources permit.
